amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $1,829,400,000 to construct double-layered fencing and vehicle barriers along the southwest border and to offset such increase by reducing all other discretionary amounts on a prorata basis.

action.text: Amendment SA 4659 proposed by Senator Sessions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4659 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 29 - 71. Record Vote Number: 200.
